title: Artist; Restorer; Imaginer; Dennis C Randall 1916-1997 Biography Pictorial
description: Dennis C Randall 1916-1997, born in Hertfordshire. Was a local artist in Northchurch, Berkhamsted. He was a master craftsman, antique restoration, pieces of art masterfully restored. Dennis made furniture, both usable, and amazing miniatures... His paintings sold all over the world, from the USA and Canada, across to Europe, from Iceland to Australia... He sold in local business's, at auction and from word of mouth primarily.He worked for many famous actors and singers, he loved his work, his art was his passion and believed it a gift from God.This book is full of old photographs, and memories... a small glimpse into the man himself.
author: Marian Bonelli
